free: #e There was a somewhat old man.
#c 有一位有點年紀的男人
#e (He) was picking plum.
#c (他)在採李子
#e There was a man pulling a goat passes by.
#c 有個男的牽著一隻羊經過。
#e He didn't even paid him attention because of his hard working on picking.
#c 他沒有注意到（經過的人），他採得太認真了。
#n ngovei could be a speech error. The correct one should be ngov'eni 'to make something hang on some place'.
#n ngovei could be a speech error. The correct one should be ngov'eni 'to make something hang on some place'.
#e He didn't stop, and put (the fruit) into the bag that was hung on his neck.
#c 他一直採，把採下來的水果放在那個掛在他脖子上的袋子裡。
#e He climbed down the tree when it (the bag) was full.
#c 如果袋子滿了，他就爬下來。
#e And put (the fruit) in the basket.
#c (把水果)放在籃子裡。
#e He then climbed up again to pick plum fruit.
#c 他又再次爬上(樹）採水果。
#e For a while, there was a boy riding a bike passed by.
#c 一會兒,有一個男孩騎著腳踏車經過。
#e He stopped where the gathered fruit was put/laid.
#c 他（男孩）停在那人放採下來的水果的地方。
#e He probably wanted to have the fruit, and took one basket of fruit away.
#c 他可能想要那些水果，帶走了一籃。
#e Put it on the bike and left.
#c 放在腳踏車上，然後離開。
#e It wasn't noticed at all (by the old man), because he was so devoted to the picking of the fruit.
#c 那個（採果的老人）完全沒注意到，或許是太努力（摘果子）。
#e The boy loaded the basket of fruit, and left on his bike.
#c 那個男孩將一籃水果放在腳踏車上，騎著腳踏車離開了。
#e A while later, he met a girl who was also riding a bike.
#c 一會兒他（男孩）遇到一位也是騎著腳踏車的女孩。
#e (They) will.... That is, met each other.
#c （他們）會互相...就是互相見面。
#e When they came across, the boy was looking at the girl devotedly.
#c 當他們兩個相遇，那男孩很專注的看著那個女孩。
#e Why in a sudden the hat of the boy was blown away by wind. The hat fell.
#c 怎麼會突然男孩的帽子被風吹走了, 就掉了下來。
#n ea-fatua "有石頭"。
#n ea-fatua "有石頭"。
#e It was seen that there was stone in the way which he would go.
#c 看到他要走的路上有石頭。
#e He bumped into the stone and fell down.
#c 他撞到石頭跌了下來。
#e The (basket) of plum he took fell.
#c 他載走的那（一籃）李子的果實也掉了下來。
#e The girl left.
#c 那個女孩離開了。
#e It probably hurt his feet, and it probably was painful.
#c 或許他的腳跌傷了，而且或許很痛。
#e Then there arrived three boys.
#c 來了三個男孩。
#e They helped put the spilt plum fruit again into the basket.
#c 他們幫忙把散落一地的李子再次放回籃子。
#e And.. then...loaded them back onto the bike ridden by the boy.
#c 然後把（那一籃水果）放在男孩坐的腳踏車上。
#e The three boys left (him), and went on...
#c 那三個男孩離開(他)走了。
#e And then... He went on again on his bike..
#c 然後他又騎上他的腳踏車。
#e Alas, his hat was forgot. The hat was dropped by him.
#c 他忘了他的帽子了，他的帽子掉在地上了。
#e And it was discovered by the three boys.
#c 那三個男孩找到那個帽子。
#n 這裡的動作者是三個人，所以助動詞應是i-he，而不是i-si。
#e (They) whistled (at him, the boy riding a bike).
#c 他們對著男孩吹口哨。
#e One of the boys returned, and returned the hat to the boy.
#c 其中一個男孩回來，把帽子還給他。
#e He gave three plums (to the three boys).
#c 他給三個李子（給那三個男孩）。
#n 鄒語的發音人都用bʉnʉvhʉ（李子）指影片中的梨子
#e (The boy given pears) left.
#c (被給梨子的男孩)離開了。
#e (He walked) toward the direction of his accompany.
#c 他往（他同伴的方向）這樣離開了。
#e The three took the pears given.
#c 那三個男生帶著男孩給的梨子。
#e and passed the one that picked..picked pears/plum fruit.
#c 經過那個採李（梨）子的男人。
#e Then the man climbed down.
#c 那個男人（從樹上）下來。
#n IU 141 之 sipeohʉ 應為 eu'sipeohʉ "爬下來"。
#e And (he) finally learned.
#c 他終究還是知道。
#e Where on earth had the previously picked fruit that was full gone?
#c 我剛剛採好已經滿了的梨子那裡去了？
#e There happened to arrive three (boys), each with a pear.
#c 剛好有三個男孩經過，每個人有一個梨子。
#e He just thinks...
#c 他只好想...
#e that it probably his thinking that they took (them).
#c 或許他想是他們拿走了梨子。
#e What I just saw was just like that.
#c 我剛看的就像那樣。像那樣。
